text: Gerald Cardinale (February 27, 1934 â€“ February 20, 2021) was an American Republican Party politician. He was a member of the New Jersey State Senate from 1982 until his death in 2021. Before, he was in the New Jersey General Assembly from 1980 until 1982. Cardinale was born in New York City. Cardinale died on February 20, 2021 at a hospital in Westwood, New Jersey at the age of 86. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2021 deaths Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Politicians from New York City Category:Politicians from New Jersey Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Gerald Cardinale
